entry.title: Announcement: libcoin
entry.summary: In an email exchange on February 1, 2012, Michael Gr√∏nager requested information about the version of Boost being used by the recipient. He specified that he required version 1.47 or 1.48, but also noted that he would create an alternative scheme if necessary. Despite upgrading to version 1.47, the error being experienced was not resolved.
